{"id":984659695,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1688314342,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/984659695/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Value of the Rearranged Number","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long smallestNumber(long long num) {\n        if(num==0) return(0);\n        bool negative=false;\n        if(num<0){\n            negative=true;\n            num*=(-1);\n        }\n        string str_num=to_string(num);\n        if(negative) sort(str_num.begin(),str_num.end(),greater<char>());\n        else{\n            int zeroes=0;\n            string pos=\"\";\n            for(char c:str_num){\n                if(c!='0')\n                pos+=c;\n                else zeroes++;\n            }\n            sort(pos.begin(),pos.end());\n            str_num=pos[0]+string(zeroes,'0')+pos.substr(1,pos.length()-1);\n        }\n        return(negative?((-1)*stoll(str_num)):stoll(str_num));\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-value-of-the-rearranged-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
